title: Provide Care
description: Attempt a basic check to organize and encourage your settlements’ healers, apothecaries, medics, and other caregivers to provide care and support for citizens in need.

criticalSuccess.msg:
You provide unexpectedly compassionate support for the people. @lose1Unrest and reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1:
  • @lose1Corruption
  • @lose1Crime
  • @lose1Decay
  • @lose1Strife

success.msg: Your care soothes the worries and fears of the populace; @lose1Unrest.

failure.msg: You don’t provide any notable care for the citizens, but at least you don’t make things worse.

criticalFailure.msg:
Your attempt to provide care backfires. @gain1Unrest or a Ruin of your choice by 1:
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife
